title: Squared typeface with flared serifs
author: tylor.reimer

comments.content:
It's a lot easier if you provide a sample. Anything we guessed based on that description, like Serpentine, would be a complete guess.

- Mike Yanega

Ha, wow yeah I thought I had attached something. It looks like you guessed it right without an image anyhow.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701110410im_/http:/typophile.com/files/olympia_3840.jpg)

That's too funny! You did describe it well, but images are better ;-)

- Mike Yanega
